title: [Large-Scale] Blended Learning Design for Advanced Computer Technology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer proficiency and administrative work experience
context.additional_context: Web 2.0 tool-based educational environment utilizing learners' personal mobile devices, emphasizing social learning design with a focus on peer interaction and personalized feedback

learning_goals: Learners can apply team project management skills using cloud-based collaboration tools
Learners can propose workflow optimization strategies using data analysis tools
Learners can actively communicate and operate feedback systems on Web 2.0-based learning platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
